name: Plug In Baby
description:
Rob had a busy day at the factory and has fallen asleep before shutting down his motors. It's up to you to guide him to safety. Plug in platforms and motorised buffers to the only power socket you have to move them.

This game was made in 48 hours as part of the GMTK Game Jam 2019. The theme was "Only One".

Controls

Drag plugs with the left mouse button. While dragging them, press [Space] to flip the polarity and change the direction of motion. If you get stuck, press the Restart button on screen to reset the current level.
